==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|alt1=亻|人|右|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

===Etymology===
From {{och-l|右|right}}.

“Right” and “left” are metaphors for “to assist” via the following semantic development: “left or right” > “to be on the left or right of a person” > “to assist, to help, to protect”.

Compare the derivation of {{och-l|佐|to assist; to help}} from {{och-l|左|left}}.
